Package raytracer.shape

Class Plane

java.lang.Object
raytracer.shape.Shape
raytracer.shape.Plane
public final class Plane extends Shape
Infinite plane defined by a point and a (possibly non-unit) normal vector.

    • intersect

      public Optional<Intersection> intersect(Ray ray)
      Intersects the plane with a ray. Returns empty if parallel to the plane or the hit is behind the origin.
      Specified by:
      intersect in class Shape
      Parameters:
      ray - ray to test
      Returns:
      closest valid intersection, if any
